ComicInfo.Summary:
Gord Cantrell travels to the depths of his past to locate information on the true nature of "the six" in Tennessee. He is haunted by the ghosts of familiar faces and the reasons for his knowledge in the dark arts starts to become clearer. At the Same time, Becky Montcrief is finally safe in the care of the Sword of Abraham's stronghold but without Drake Sinclair, she must focus her efforts on furthering her understanding of the sixth gun.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-06 18:51:38. [CVDB293611]
